item.description: This is a last minute announcement. This Saturday there will be a series of entrepreneurship talk by big name entrepreneurs-turned-Venture-Capitalists and a business pitch competition at Harvard University. If you want to hear about lots of business ideas in Chinese and some in English. I will be pitching about a website idea. If you are interested, please let me know(benzhangpro at gmail.com). Details are here http://hcssa.org/inde... Talks are in the morning. Business pitching is in the afternoon. The location is in Hall C of the Harvard Science Center. The event will involve intermediate and advanced Chinese usage.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Business Pitching Competition and Talks by Famous Chinese Businesspeople
